pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rainforest Plots for Meta-Analysis // Creates rainforest plots (proposed by Schild Voracek, 2015 doi:10.1002/jrsm.1125), a variant and enhancement of the classic forest plot for meta- analysis. In the near future, the 'metaviz' package will be extended by further, established as well as novel, plotting options for visualizing meta-analytic data.
